chinatown1.description: On the way to meet the Frasiers for dim sum in Chinatown, we picked up some goodies at the fortune cookie factory.  Yum!
chinatown1.title: Chinatown 1

chinatown2.description: Felix and Evan don't get to see each other often. It's a pity, because they fall together like drunken sailors.
chinatown2.title: Chinatown 2

chinatown3.description: The big white wheels pull all the cables that pull San Francisco's cable cars.
chinatown3.title: Chinatown 3

joyce1.description: With the Joyces on Indian Rock.  It's only been a month since Felix last visited, but this was the first time he was sure-footed enough to roam all over it by himself.
joyce1.title: Joyce 1

joyce2.description: Milo insisted on bringing a backpack and remote control car, just like his big brother.  So far Felix has loved being a role model.
joyce2.title: Joyce 2

writing.description: Felix has started writing his name!
writing.title: Writing

description:
Lucie takes Felix to the Lawrence Hall of Science for a science class on Mondays. They stepped into the latest session and it turned out to be a kids only class -- no grownups allowed. Felix managed to keep it together when Mom left, and had a blast. The next session, he was VERY proud to march in by himself and wave bye to Lucie. Lucie brought Milo to see the museum while waiting for Felix, and Milo was very proud be included in the previously Felix-only outing. He understood it was a big boy thing. Except he had been mis-hearing what Lucie and Felix had been going to, and kept yelling, "Iron Giant! Iron Giant!" instead of Lawerence Hall of Science.

Dean and Felix are reading Stuart Little at bedtime, two chapters a night. There's hardly any pictures. Felix loves it. Dean's already thinking of when they can read Harry Potter together.

Milo's adding more and more grammar. In the last week, "I Superman!" has become "Papa, I Superman. You bad guy." So far the grammar is mostly English.
title: November 12
